title: Большая ракушка
author: Kalmykov Alexandr
description:
This artpiece is done with oil on canvas. 'Big Shell' is related to pointllism and devisionism style being a representative of still-life genre. This very special technique is based on writing with separate (non-isolated) strokes of the correct point or rectangular shapes. Looking at this painting it seems like the objects are appearing from nowhere, they look like real 3D ones. Very impressive.

This artwork took part in several art festivals and exhibitions approved by corresponding certificates and galleries art catalogues.

Pay attention: Upon buying the digitalized copy of this masterpiece in Ultra HD 1:1 resolution, you will receive the original physical Authentic Painting.
